description:
Goh`s Froakie was caught in a park in Lumiose City. Goh spotted it come out of a pond and with some advice from Bonnie and a few attempts to tire out Froakie, he managed to get it.
Goh`s Frogadier is the evolved form of Goh`s Froakie. It evolved during a play battle with Chloe`s Eevee in Sakuragi Park.
name: Keromatsu (Gou)
